definition.text: For the app.contribute command to work, you need to authenticate at two different levels. We'll deal with GiHub.com first!

paragraphs.text: You need to authenticate at GitHub.com for the Client to create the Pull Request on your behalf. To do that, you will create a Personal Access Token on GitHub.com:
Create a GitHub.com Personal Access Token->github.com/settings/tokens/new
Click the link and follow the instructions below! Check the clip on the next step for clarity...
I suggest you name the token after Superalgos so that you may recognize it later on, and make sure you check the repo checkbox to define the scope of the token.
